DOC.brief_summary: To collect and organize data into a repository for future research.
DOC.brief_title: Spinal Arthrodesis and Spinal Arthroplasty Database Study
DOC.detailed_description: To collect and organize data into a repository from the Principal Investigator's (H. Francis Farhadi, MD, PhD) patients who are undergoing spinal arthrodesis and/or spinal arthroplasty procedures at Ohio State University for future research, as yet to be identified. This comprehensive database of patients will allow for gathering of relevant information for potential future research use.
DOC.criteria: Must have had or will undergo a spinal arthrodesis and/or spinal arthroplasty procedure at Ohio State University
